Our Story

It all started in Iceland. Antoine decided to visit the tiny island. Antoines mother, Jacky didn´t really seem the reason why her sun wanted to go “to the north” during the summer, no beaches and bad weather. After returning home his father says his faced was lit up. He had met someone. Gudrun Maria still thanks him for coming all the way to Iceland to find her. For there on, they saw each other as often as possible. For the luck of good collegues GMJ was able to fit in many shifts in a row and then take a time of to go to France to see her boy and miraclously, AT had vacation left. Spring 2013 GMJ moved in on AT in Paris. Passion for travel, took off for a world trip. Settled in Iceland. Rest is history.

Warm-up Party

28.12.2016 at 7 PM

Sæta Svínið

Hafnarstraeti 1-3

It is time for the Frenchies and the Vikings to get to know each other! Come and join us for a fun night down town Reykjavik! They serve great food and drinks. Pub quiz will start at 8 PM

The wedding

30.12.2016

The ceremony will take place at Dómkirkjan by Austurvöllur at 4:30 PM. Please bring your babelfish with you! The church is warmed so no worries! We recommend bringing warm boots, coats, gloves and a hat for the two minutes walk over to Iðnó where the reception will take place. Bringing heels in a bag is normal in Iceland, so no need to wear boots all night, unless you want to! We have not signed up with any gift registry but we are saving for our honeymoon.

New Years Eve

31.12.2016 at 6 PM

Bryggjan Brugghús

Grandagarður 8

We will celebrate New Years Eve at Bryggjan Brugghús, Brewery and Restaurant by the Reykjavik Harbor. They will put together a three course menu for us for 9.900 ISK (73 euros) per person. They have a phenomenal beer selection we recommend! Later we plan on shooting up fireworks and dancing the night away! Please send an email to trota.antoine@gmail.com for confirmation and let us know about any food allergies!
